tajweed.name: Qur'anic Recitation (Tajweed)
tajweed.summary: Mastery of recitation rules and articulation with proper pronunciation and melody.
tajweed.description: Our comprehensive Tajweed program focuses on the precise articulation of Qur'anic verses according to classical rules. Students learn proper pronunciation, rhythm, and melody under expert guidance.

hifz.name: Hifz Program
hifz.summary: Memorization and revision methodology with dedicated mentoring and support.
hifz.description: Complete memorization of the Holy Quran with systematic revision techniques. Our experienced teachers provide personalized guidance for each student's memorization journey.

hadith.name: Hadith Studies
hadith.summary: Foundational texts, methodology, and commentary of Prophetic traditions.
hadith.description: In-depth study of authentic Hadith collections including Sahih Bukhari, Sahih Muslim, and other classical works. Students learn the science of Hadith and its practical application.

fiqh.name: Fiqh & Usul
fiqh.summary: Islamic jurisprudence principles and their practical application in daily life.
fiqh.description: Comprehensive study of Islamic law covering worship, transactions, family matters, and contemporary issues. Students develop skills in legal reasoning and fatwa methodology.
fiqh.prerequisites: Advanced Arabic and basic Islamic studies

arabic.name: Arabic Language
arabic.summary: Classical Arabic grammar, morphology, and comprehension skills development.
arabic.description: Structured program covering Arabic grammar (Nahw), morphology (Sarf), rhetoric (Balagha), and literature. Essential foundation for all Islamic studies.

library.name: Library Services
library.summary: Comprehensive catalog, reading rooms, and research access for scholarly pursuits.
library.description: State-of-the-art library with over 15,000 books, manuscripts, and digital resources. Quiet study spaces and research assistance available for students and faculty.

hostel.name: Student Hostel
hostel.summary: On-campus accommodation with comprehensive student welfare services.
hostel.description: Safe and comfortable accommodation for out-of-town students. Includes meals, study halls, recreational facilities, and 24/7 supervision.

mosque.name: Campus Mosque
mosque.summary: Central place of worship hosting congregational prayers and community programs.
mosque.description: Beautiful mosque serving as the spiritual center of our campus. Regular congregational prayers, Friday sermons, and special programs throughout the year.
